title: Explore Your R Libraries
text: can install development version libminer GitHub :

title: Explore Your R Libraries
text: get count installed packages libraries, optionally total sizes, use lib_summary().
code: library(libminer)   lib_summary() #>                                                                                         Library #> 1                          /Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Versions/4.3-arm64/Resources/library #> 2 /private/var/folders/q6/f8g18nm144x43yv5z3fzkkq40000gn/T/Rtmpkfoj8Q/temp_libpath14999771d9320 #>   n_packages #> 1        127 #> 2          1 #specify sizes = TRUE lib_summary(sizes = TRUE) #>                                                                                         Library #> 1                          /Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Versions/4.3-arm64/Resources/library #> 2 /private/var/folders/q6/f8g18nm144x43yv5z3fzkkq40000gn/T/Rtmpkfoj8Q/temp_libpath14999771d9320 #>   n_packages  lib_size #> 1        127 222860303 #> 2          1     14627

title: Library Summary — lib_summary
text: Provides brief summary package libraries machine

title: Library Summary — lib_summary
text: sizes logical value indicating whether allocate sizes. Defualt = FALSE

title: Library Summary — lib_summary
text: data.frame containing count packages user's libraries. sizes = TRUE, column library sizes added.

title: Library Summary — lib_summary
code: lib_summary() #>                           Library n_packages #> 1 /home/runner/work/_temp/Library         72 #> 2      /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/library         29 #> 3 /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/site-library          1 lib_summary(sizes = TRUE) #>                           Library n_packages lib_size #> 1 /home/runner/work/_temp/Library         72 74028943 #> 2      /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/library         29 69575875 #> 3 /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/site-library          1 14838588
